ygData.subject: Cantera153 segmentation fault
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear Goodwin, I am now trying to run Cantera with the GRI30 modified to take into account Helium. I produced the modified gri30.cti using the command line

Dear Goodwin,

I am now trying to run Cantera with the GRI30 'modified' to 
take into account Helium.
I produced the 'modified' gri30.cti using the command line utility 
ch2cti and the resulting file is produced without error messages.
When I try to run the Python demo file "npflame1" or the Matlab demo 
file "diffflame", with the following lines
gas = importPhase('gri30He.cti')
or
gas = IdealGasMix('gri30He.cti')
instead of 
gas = GRI30('Mix')
the result is a segmentation fault.
Do you have any suggestion ?

Many thanks
Gianfilippo Coppola
